overview: From the Damage, Inc. world tour. Filmed on November 17th, 1986. Setlist : Battery Master of Puppets For Whom The Bell Tolls Welcome Home (Sanitarium) Ride the Lightning Bass Solo Whiplash The Thing That Should Not Be Fade to Black Seek & Destroy Creeping Death The Four Horsemen Guitar Solo Am I Evil? Damage, Inc. Fight Fire With Fire
title: Metallica: [1986] Nagoya, Japan
